abstract: Stocks fall sharply as bank and tech shares plummet.

headline.print_headline: Decline in Bank and Tech Shares Drives the Market Lower
headline.main: Bank and Tech Shares Pull Wall Street Lower

snippet: A general lack of vigor in world economies took a toll on United States equities, as Treasury rates slipped and the dollar continued to fall against the yen.
lead_paragraph: A general lack of vigor in world economies took a toll on United States equities, as Treasury rates slipped and the dollar continued to fall against the yen.
